overview: Relationships are complicated and no two are alike. Award-winning director, Tony Dimarco, explores what happens when friends from all types of relationships --closed to open -- get together to play a little sex game called '7 Minutes in Heaven'. When these eight hung and horny studs play the game, the tops put their names in a bowl and the bottoms draw to see who they hit it with. Anything can happen, couples are swapped and everyone finishes satisfied in this bareback feature from iconic Falcon Studios.
title: 7 Minutes In Heaven
